My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Project Github

This project is a clone app of CoinMarketCap.com using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 4, Angular/TypeScript, and GIT for version control. Also learned the basics of unit testing with Jasmine/Karma.

Project Github

This is the same CryptoTop100 project. This is a data visualization chart that pulls the the prices of Bitcoin for the last year from the coinmarketcap API and charts them out using Angular's Chartjs module.

Project Github

This is a project called YelpCamp. It is a fictional CRUD(Create, Read, Update, Delete) application where you can create an account to add and comment on various campgrounds. It uses HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, jQuery, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, Authentication, Authorization, PassportJS, and GIT for version control.

Project Built with Squarespace

This is a website for Debbie Maxwell-Realtor. It is built on Squarespace. I also added custom CSS and an iframe to connect to her IDX Multiple-Listing Service. It also incorporates MailChimp for automated Email marketing on form submissions. This project is continually being updated.
